## Brief Intro

Hi, this is Ying Jin, a fresh graduate student at Columbia Mailman School of Public Health. I grew up in Xi'an, China and got my undergraduate degree at Xiamen University. I always look for new things to try  and new friends to meet. Hope you will enjoy my personal website:)!
